roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.body: It seems like you've requested something that is already on the roadmap. Please keep in mind we do this in our free time for free, so please be patient.
roadmap.description: Tells users that something is already on the roadmap.

duplicate.title: Duplicate
duplicate.body: This seems to be a duplicate of [#{arg0}](https://github.com/ScratchEverywhere/ScratchEverywhere/issues/{arg0}) on GitHub
duplicate.description: Tells users that there's already a thread on GitHub.

pr.title: Pull Request
pr.body: There seems to be a pull request that adds this: [#{arg0}](https://github.com/ScratchEverywhere/ScratchEverywhere/pull/{arg0})
pr.description: Tells users that there's a pull request that adds a feature they're asking for.

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Shows an image of the controls.

platforms.title: Platform Support
platforms.body: Please see [#166](https://github.com/ScratchEverywhere/ScratchEverywhere/issues/166) on GitHub for anything related to porting to other platforms.
platforms.description: Links to our tracking issue on platform support.

features.title: {lookup}

body.3ds: Resolution 400x480 enables both screens. 400x240 and 320x240 display to top and bottom screens respectively.
body.wiiu: Displaying across the TV and Gamepad are currently unsupported
body.wii: There are currently no special features for this platform
body.gamecube: There are currently no special features for this platform
body.switch: There are currently no special features for this platform
body.vita: There are currently no special features for this platform

features.description: Provides special features for given platforms.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.body: Scratch Everywhere!'s limitations can be found in [the readme here](https://github.com/ScratchEverywhere/ScratchEverywhere/tree/main#limitations).

guide.title: Homebrew Guide

body.wiiu: Go to https://wiiu.hacks.guide to learn how to homebrew your Wii U.
body.wii: Go to https://wii.hacks.guide to learn how to homebrew your Wii.
body.vita: Go to https://vita.hacks.guide to learn how to homebrew your PS Vita.
body.3ds: Go to https://3ds.hacks.guide to learn how to homebrew your 3DS.
body.switch: Go to https://switch.hacks.guide to learn how to homebrew your Switch.

guide.description: Redirects people to the appropriote homebrew guide.

body.1: Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech will be tolerated.
body.2: No age-restricted or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content.
body.3: No spam or self-promotion (server invites, advertisements, etc) without permission from a staff member. This includes DMing fellow members without permission from them. Server Invites are allowed to redirect people to better places to get help for specific issues.
body.4: Please keep conversations in this server English only. It's perfectly fine to use a translator like Google Translate, this just makes moderation easier.
body.5: Don't be a jerk. We work on this in our free time for free, so please be patient. If we ask you a question and you don't give us an answer, don't expect us to help you.
